swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.backend

Class Module

  • java.lang.Object
    • swp_compiler_ss13.fuc.backend.Module

  • public class Module
extends java.lang.Object
    This class corresponds to an LLVM IR module. Code is currently generated with functions, which can be added with addFunction. Additionally, it has all static functions, as well as certain non-static functions (those which need access to the module's private members) used to convert types from Java / three address code to LLVM IR.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.StringBuilder dataSegment
      The data segment for this module, meaning code for global variables, global constants, etc.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Function> functions
      The functions in this module.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> stringLiterals
      A list of all the string literals that exist in this module, where each element describes a string literal's number with its position in the list and that string literal's length with the value of the element.

      Module()
      Creates a new module.

        Returns:

      • getIRType

        public static java.lang.String getIRType(Type.Kind type)
        Get the LLVM IR type corresponding to a type from the three address code.

        Returns:

      • getIRAType

        public static java.lang.String getIRAType(Type type,
                          java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> dimensions)
        Get the LLVM IR type corresponding to an *array* type from the three address code.
        Parameters:
        type - the final type of the array, e.g.: double[][] --> double
        dimensions - a list of the array dimensions, e.g.: double x[5][10][7] --> [5,10,7]
        Returns:
        the corresponding LLVM IR type for the array

      • getIRSType

        public static java.lang.String getIRSType(java.util.List<Member> members)
        Get the LLVM IR type corresponding to a *struct* type from the three address code.
        Parameters:
        members - the member's in the struct type
        Returns:
        the corresponding LLVM IR type for the struct

      • toIRBoolean

        public static java.lang.String toIRBoolean(java.lang.String bool)
        Convert a three adress code boolean to a LLVM IR boolean. All other public functions expect booleans to be in the LLVM IR format.
        Parameters:
        bool - a TAC boolean
        Returns:
        the converted LLVM IR boolean

        Parameters:
        str - a TAC string
        Returns:
        the converted LLVM IR string
